mapper.select: SELECT p.p_no , p.t_no , p.m_qr , p.p_kg , p.p_bone , p.p_fat , p.p_comment , (SELECT m_name FROM members WHERE m_qr = p.m_qr) AS m_name , (SELECT CONCAT(SUBSTR(m_phone,1,3),'-',REPEAT('*',CHAR_LENGTH(m_phone)-7),'-',SUBSTR(m_phone,8,4)) FROM members WHERE m_qr = p.m_qr) AS m_phone , (SELECT m_email FROM members WHERE m_qr = p.m_qr) AS m_email , (SELECT m_realP FROM members WHERE m_qr = p.m_qr) AS m_realP FROM pt p WHERE p.t_no = #{t_no} AND p.p_no = #{p_no} AND p.m_qr = #{m_qr}
SELECT r.r_no , r.t_no , r.m_qr , r.p_no , r.r_ct , r.r_date FROM round r WHERE r.t_no = #{t_no} AND r.p_no = #{p_no} AND r.m_qr = #{m_qr} ORDER BY r_no DESC

SELECT r.r_no , r.t_no , r.m_qr , r.p_no , r.r_ct , r.r_date , (SELECT m_name FROM members WHERE m_qr = r.m_qr) AS m_name , (SELECT CONCAT(SUBSTR(m_phone,1,3),'-',REPEAT('*',CHAR_LENGTH(m_phone)-7),'-',SUBSTR(m_phone,8,4)) FROM members WHERE m_qr = r.m_qr) AS m_phone , (SELECT m_email FROM members WHERE m_qr = r.m_qr) AS m_email , (SELECT m_realP FROM members WHERE m_qr = r.m_qr) AS m_realP FROM round r WHERE r.r_no = #{r_no}

SELECT e.e_no , e.r_no , e.t_no , e.m_qr , e.p_no , e.e_name , e.e_set , e.e_cnt , e.e_kg , e.e_time , e.e_part , e.e_rest FROM exercise e WHERE e.t_no = #{t_no} AND e.p_no = #{p_no} AND e.m_qr = #{m_qr} AND e.r_no = #{r_no} ORDER BY e_no DESC
SELECT e.e_no , e.r_no , e.t_no , e.m_qr , e.p_no , e.e_name , e.e_set , e.e_cnt , e.e_kg , e.e_time , e.e_part , e.e_rest FROM exercise e WHERE e.e_no = #{e_no}
